analysis.description:
SontakuToken._validatePurchase (/unique_chucks/29/0x42e7c2bb305537e89f6a26a192d7a1b34fd76cde.sol#447-463) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp <= crowdsaleClosingTime) (/unique_chucks/29/0x42e7c2bb305537e89f6a26a192d7a1b34fd76cde.sol#459-463)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= crowdsaleOpeningTime) (/unique_chucks/29/0x42e7c2bb305537e89f6a26a192d7a1b34fd76cde.sol#458-459)
